name: Now You See Them...
text:
[ Skill activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
[ Effect ]
Once per Duel, if you have 2 or more "Dark Magician(s)" in your hand, reveal your hand and place any number of "Dark Magician(s)" from your hand on the bottom of the Deck(s), then draw cards based on how many cards you placed:
● 1: 1 card,
● 2: 3 cards,
● 3: 5 cards.
